data.persona: I am the King's wife. I rule with him over the town. I am confident and others looks up to me.
data.description:
You are in the Queen's Bedchamber.
The chamber is fit for royalty. A four-poster beds with a plush mattress adorns the room. A chifforobe of immense value is placed in the room, as is a bell for summoning a horde of servants.
There's a mattress, a jewelry, a plush mattress, a chifferobe, a bell, and a bed here.
The maid is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a gown.

data.short_motivation: I am going to pray before bed
data.mid_motivation: I want to rest well and to let god know that I am holy and devout
data.long_motivation: I want the lord to be on our side so we may rule with dignity, grace, and power
